code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Destinations=()=>{const destinations=useSelector(state=>state.destinations);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pt-24 px-6 md:px-12 lg:px-20 bg-gray-50 min-h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold text-center text-orange-500 mb-12",children:"Explore Our Destinations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-8",children:destinations.map(place=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md overflow-hidden transform transition duration-300 hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-2xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:place.image,alt:place.name,className:"w-full h-40 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-bold text-gray-800",children:place.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between text-gray-500 text-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:place.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u2B50 ",place.rating]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mt-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-lg font-semibold text-orange-500",children:["$",place.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/destination/".concat(place.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded-lg text-sm font-semibold transition transform hover:scale-105",children:"Book Now"})})]})]})]},place.id))})]});};export default Destinations;
